primary.name: Vendor / Manufacturer
primary.description: Sellers who manufacture or produce clothing items.

primary.name: Reseller
primary.description: Sellers who source clothing from markets or wholesalers and resell.

primary.name: Thrift Store
primary.description: Sellers offering pre-owned, upcycled, or vintage clothing.

primary.name: Creator / Influencer
primary.description: Creators who design, curate, or promote their personal clothing collections.

primary.name: Design Studio / Boutique
primary.description: Fashion studios and boutique labels selling original designs.

secondary.name: Dropshipper
secondary.description: Sellers who list items shipped directly from suppliers.

secondary.name: Custom Tailor
secondary.description: Tailors offering custom-sized or made-to-order clothing.

secondary.name: Handmade / Artisan Clothing
secondary.description: Artisan sellers offering hand-stitched or handcrafted clothing.

secondary.name: Print-On-Demand
secondary.description: Sellers offering custom printed T-shirts, hoodies, and apparel.

secondary.name: Sustainable / Ethical Brand
secondary.description: Brands focused on eco-friendly materials and ethical production.

specialized.name: Streetwear Brand
specialized.description: Independent or creator-led streetwear clothing lines.

specialized.name: High Fashion / Luxury Label
specialized.description: Premium fashion brands offering couture or luxury clothing.

specialized.name: Ethnic / Cultural Wear
specialized.description: Sellers focusing on traditional clothing like kurtas, sarees, lehengas.

specialized.name: Kidswear Brand
specialized.description: Sellers specialized in kids & baby clothing.

specialized.name: Lingerie & Innerwear
specialized.description: Sellers focused on innerwear, loungewear, nightwear.

specialized.name: Plus-Size Clothing Brand
specialized.description: Sellers offering extended and inclusive sizing.

specialized.name: Uniform & Corporate Clothing
specialized.description: Sellers who make uniforms for schools, offices, hotels.

service_focused.name: Fashion Stylist
service_focused.description: Stylists curating outfits and styling services.

service_focused.name: Fashion Rental Store
service_focused.description: Stores renting out designer or occasion wear.

service_focused.name: Upcycling Artist
service_focused.description: Creators who recycle fabric and repurpose old clothing.
